Co Founder/COO at Tia
"Before switching to Candid, I was spending 20 hours a week managing our other biller. Now, Candid finds and fixes most issues affecting our revenue cycle before we even notice and our insurance collection rates are higher than ever."

## Easily find opportunities in real-time
Get out-of-the-box reporting at your fingertips to seamlessly pinpoint opportunities in your revenue cycle.
[Try reports](https://www.joincandidhealth.com/</features/reporting>)

Prevent claim issues before they occur
Get transparency at your fingertips into your billing and financial health to pinpoint areas of improvement and opportunity.
![Claim UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6422454f4b30ff01ff76c93a/6438df849958783924716bdb_Claim-frame.webp)
Make billing insurance our problem. Not yours.
The revenue cycle automation platform for fast-growing healthcare providers—large and small.

generated_description:
Candid Health is a San Francisco-based startup founded in 2019, recognizing a crucial pain point in healthcare: the inefficiencies in revenue cycle management. Being part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, Candid Health quickly positioned itself as a player in the digital health ecosystem.

At the core of Candid Health's mission lies its revenue cycle automation platform. This platform is designed for healthcare providers, streamlining and optimizing every facet of the revenue cycle—from billing issues to insurance collections. The company employs around 55 people, including a prominent Group Partner, Gustaf Alstromer, which indicates a robust support system for their growth.

Candid's features are built around three key pillars: automation, integrations, and data reporting. The platform aims to prevent claim issues before they occur, ensuring that employees spend less time on billing errors and more time focused on patient care. For instance, users can automate repetitive tasks, seamlessly integrate their existing systems with flexible APIs, and access real-time reporting to identify opportunities for improvement.

Their automation capabilities are particularly notable. Candid Health not only detects billing issues but proactively fixes them, enabling teams to recoup revenues without manual fuss. This modern approach to revenue cycle management allows healthcare providers to allocate their resources more effectively—one customer remarked that switching to Candid saved her 20 hours a week previously spent managing billing tasks.

Candid Health garners trust from a growing list of digital health companies, demonstrating its impact in the space (the logos of several partner companies featured prominently on their site). The company is poised for growth, and its mission to make billing "our problem, not yours" resonates well in a sector that struggles under the weight of administrative burdens.

In summary, Candid Health is simplifying an aspect of healthcare that everyone dreads—billing. With their automation platform, they are not just helping providers make sense of their finances but also freeing them up to do what they do best: care for patients. If you're in the healthcare field and dealing with the headaches of revenue cycle management, Candid Health is definitely worth a look.

For more information, visit their website at [Candid Health](https://www.joincandidhealth.com).
